00016 #ifndef __FOCUSEVENT_APPUI_H__
00017 #define __FOCUSEVENT_APPUI_H__
00018 
00019 // INCLUDES
00020 #include <aknappui.h>
00021 
00022 // FORWARD DECLARATIONS
00023 class CFocusEventAppView;
00024 
00025 // CLASS DECLARATION
00026 /**
00027 * CFocusEventAppUi application UI class.
00028 * Interacts with the user through the UI and request message processing
00029 * from the handler class
00030 */
00031 class CFocusEventAppUi : public CAknAppUi
00032     {
00033     public: // Constructors and destructors
00034 
00035         /**
00036         * CFocusEventAppUi.
00037         * C++ default constructor. This needs to be public due to
00038         * the way the framework constructs the AppUi
00039         */
00040         CFocusEventAppUi();
00041 
00042         /**
00043         * ~CFocusEventAppUi.
00044         * Virtual Destructor.
00045         */
00046         virtual ~CFocusEventAppUi();
00047 
00048     public:  // Functions from base classes
00049 
00050         /**
00051         * From CAknAppUi, HandleForegroundEventL.
00052         * Handles a change of focus.
00053         * @param aForeground is ETrue is this application has focus.
00054         */
00055         void HandleForegroundEventL( TBool aForeground );
00056 
00057         /**
00058         * From CEikAppUi, HandleCommandL.
00059         * Takes care of command handling.
00060         * @param aCommand Command to be handled.
00061         */
00062         void HandleCommandL( TInt aCommand );
00063 
00064     private: // Constructors
00065 
00066         /**
00067         * ConstructL.
00068         * 2nd phase constructor.
00069         */
00070         void ConstructL();
00071 
00072     private: // Data
00073 
00074         /**
00075         * The application view
00076         * Owned by CFocusEventAppUi
00077         */
00078         CFocusEventAppView* iAppView;
00079     };
00080 
00081 #endif // __FOCUSEVENT_APPUI_H__
00082 
00083 // End of File
